body: @ruseinov Your issue is not related to `GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT`. You are not allowed to import [`internal` package](https://github.com/ruseinov/gofail/blob/master/main.go#L4) (or its subpackages) of a third party repo. Read more about **Go 1.4 "Internal" Packages** [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1e8kOo3r51b2BWtTs_1uADIA5djfXhPT36s6eHVRIvaU/edit#).
